item.title: How to connect Apple Magic Keyboard with multiple devices
item.description: How to connect Apple Magic Keyboard with multiple devices Link to heading Apple Magic Keyboard is one of the most famous / fun-to-use keyboards. I recently got one and wanted to use it with multiple computers and OS. In particular, I mainly use the keyboard connected via Bluetooth to my MacBook Pro, and I’d like to use it with a computer that has both Windows and Ubuntu operative systems.
